00025 #include "mcu_periph/uart.h"
00026 
00027 #ifdef USE_UART0
00028 struct uart_periph uart0;
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #ifdef USE_UART1
00032 struct uart_periph uart1;
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #ifdef USE_UART2
00036 struct uart_periph uart2;
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 #ifdef USE_UART3
00040 struct uart_periph uart3;
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 #ifdef USE_UART5
00044 struct uart_periph uart5;
00045 #endif
00046 
00047 void uart_periph_init(struct uart_periph* p) {
00048   p->rx_insert_idx = 0;
00049   p->rx_extract_idx = 0;
00050   p->tx_insert_idx = 0;
00051   p->tx_extract_idx = 0;
00052   p->tx_running = FALSE;
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool_t uart_check_free_space(struct uart_periph* p, uint8_t len) {
00056   int16_t space = p->tx_extract_idx - p->tx_insert_idx;
00057   if (space <= 0)
00058     space += UART_TX_BUFFER_SIZE;
00059   return (uint16_t)(space - 1) >= len;
00060 }
